罩.definition: to cover; to spread over; a cover; a shade; a hood; bamboo fish trap; bamboo chicken coop; (Tw) (coll.) to protect; to have sb's back; (Tw) (coll.) awesome; incredible; (Tw) (coll.) (often as 罩得住[zhao4de2zhu4]) to have things under control; to be able to handle it

罩袍.definition: Chinese-style long robe worn as outermost garment; burqa

罩門.definition: Achilles' heel; chink in the armor
